muclient.script:
require "mw_theme_base" require "serialize" require "movewindow" require "commas" require "gmcphelper" require "copytable"
-- pull in telnet option handling dofile(GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(),20).."telnet_options.lua") -- functions for handling Aardwolf color codes dofile(GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(),20).."aardwolf_colors.lua")
-- set all color codes for AnsiNote local c_bright = ANSI(1) local c_dark = ANSI(22) local c_red = ANSI(31) local c_green = ANSI(32) local c_yellow = ANSI(33) local c_blue = ANSI(34) local c_magenta = ANSI(35) local c_cyan = ANSI(36) local c_white = ANSI(37) -- set script name for later use local logo = ColoursToANSI('@Co-}@YHooK@C{-o @Y[@x051Au@x044t@x037oS@x030p@x037el@x044l@x051up@Y] @cv@C1@c.@C6') local logoshort = ColoursToANSI('@Y[@x051Au@x044t@x037oS@x030p@x037el@x044l@x051up@Y]')
------------------- -- Helper functions ------------------- function sb(b) if b then return 'true' else return 'false' end end function gb(s) if s == 'true' then return true else return false end end function PadString(str, len, char) if char == nil then char = ' ' end return string.rep(char, len - #str) .. str end function dump(o) if type(o) == 'table' then local s = '{ ' for k,v in pairs(o) do if type(k) ~= 'number' then k = '"'..k..'"' end s = s .. '['..k..'] = ' .. dump(v) .. ',' end return s .. '} ' else return tostring(o) end end
----------------- -- Default values ----------------- env_active = gb(GetVariable('env_active')) or false -- is autocasting active? No by default, save choice across sessions env_active2 = gb(GetVariable('env_active2')) or false -- is auto sanctuary monitoring active? No by default, save choice across sessions env_active3 = gb(GetVariable('env_active3')) or false -- is warning report active? No by default, save choice across sessions env_debug = gb(GetVariable('env_debug')) or false -- debug output, to keep track on what's triggered when env_init = false -- has plugin been initialized (synced with server) env_sanc = false -- do we need sanctuary? env_sanc_aura = false -- do we need to reset from aura to spell? env_sanc_aura_lock = gb(GetVariable('env_sanc_aura_lock')) or false -- are we forcing the use of sanc aura? env_sanc_queue = false -- do we need sanctuary after strangle or sleep/sitting? env_sanc_queue2 = false -- do we need to juggle sanc aura after sleep or something? env_sanc_m = false -- do we need to manually reset sanctuary? env_cskill = false -- do we need clan skill recast? env_spellup = false -- do we need spellup? env_casting = false -- is spellup already been cast? (sometimes we can spam too much, make sure we don't) env_gaias_focus = false -- do we need gaias focus? env_gaias_damtype = GetVariable('env_gaias_damtype') or 'earth' env_gaias_revenge = false -- do we need gaias revenge? sanc_aura1 = GetVariable('sanc_aura1') or '1' -- clan or some other aura sanc_aura2 = GetVariable('sanc_aura2') or '2' -- aura that gives sanctuary sanc_bag1 = GetVariable('sanc_bag1') or '1' -- container for aura1 sanc_bag2 = GetVariable('sanc_bag2') or '2' -- container for aura2 warn_chan = GetVariable('warn_chan') or 'gt' -- default channel for warnings player_stat = '1' -- gmcp('char.status.state') env_gag = false -- dial down the spam from the screen if needed
------------------------ -- Main trigger function ------------------------ function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if env_active then -- only do something if the script is active if (id == '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264') then if text == 'char.status' then if player_stat ~= gmcp('char.status.state') then if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then if player_stat == '12' then -- After speedwalk debugout('char.status.state - After speedwalk -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() elseif player_stat == '8' then -- After combat debugout('char.status.state - After combat -> sanc_reset(); give_spellup()') sanc_reset() give_spellup() elseif player_stat == '4' then -- After AFK debugout('char.status.state - After AFK -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() elseif player_stat == '9' then -- After Sleep debugout('char.status.state - After Sleep -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() elseif player_stat == '11' then -- After Resting or Sitting debugout('char.status.state - After Resting or Sitting -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() elseif player_stat == '5' or player_stat == '6' or player_stat == '7' then -- After Note or Build or Paged Output debugout('char.status.state -- After Note or Build or Paged Output -> env_init = false; give_spellup()') env_init = false give_spellup() end elseif gmcp('char.status.state') == '8' then if env_sanc or env_sanc_queue then give_spellup() end end player_stat = gmcp('char.status.state') end elseif text == 'char.stats' then -- give_spellup() -- this gets called when we power/level up, might be in combat, so ignore elseif text == 'comm.tick' then if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then debugout('comm.tick - Out of Combat -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() -- act on ticks only out of combat! elseif gmcp('char.status.state') == '4' then debugout('comm.tick - AFK -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() -- act on ticks only while AFK! elseif gmcp('char.status.state') == '9' then debugout('comm.tick - Sleeping -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() -- act on ticks only while sleeping! elseif gmcp('char.status.state') == '11' then debugout('comm.tick - Resting -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() -- act on ticks only while resting! end end end -- Listen to GAG options if id == '40d90f1d52244dfd57c79bab' then -- msg = 11 -- definiran arg[0] u BroadcastPlugin() -- id = 40d90f1d52244dfd57c79bab -- id plugina -- name = WarsEnchantBot -- name plugina -- text = gagON -- definiran arg[1] u BroadcastPlugin() if text == 'gagON' then env_gag = true debugout('Cought broadcast gagON') debugout('msg: '..dump(msg)) debugout('id: '..dump(id)) debugout('name: '..dump(name)) debugout('text: '..dump(text)) elseif text == 'gagOFF' then env_gag = false debugout('Cought broadcast gagOFF') debugout('msg: '..dump(msg)) debugout('id: '..dump(id)) debugout('name: '..dump(name)) debugout('text: '..dump(text)) end end end end
------------------ -- Alias functions ------------------ function toggle_spellup() if env_active then env_active = false EnableTriggerGroup('spellup', false) AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w script turned @ROFF')) else env_init = false env_active = true EnableTriggerGroup('spellup', true) AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w script turned @GON')) end SaveState() end
function toggle_sanctuary() if env_sanc_aura_lock then AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanc aura lock turned @GOFF')) sanc_aura_unlock() else AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanc aura lock turned @RON')) sanc_aura_lock() end end
function toggle_warning() if env_active3 then env_active3 = false EnableTriggerGroup('warning', false) AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanctuary watching turned @ROFF')) else env_active3 = true EnableTriggerGroup('warning', true) AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanctuary watching turned @GON')) end SaveState() end
function toggle_debug() if env_debug then env_debug = false AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w debug output turned @ROFF')) else env_debug = true AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w debug output turned @GON')) end SaveState() end
function gaias_change_damtype(dam) env_gaias_damtype = dam AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w gaias focus damtype changed to @W'..dam)) SaveState() end
function setup_autosanc(i, j) if i == 'aura1' then sanc_aura1 = j AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanc_aura1 set to: @G'..sanc_aura1)) elseif i == 'aura2' then sanc_aura2 = j AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanc_aura2 set to: @G'..sanc_aura2)) elseif i == 'bag1' then sanc_bag1 = j AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanc_bag1 set to: @G'..sanc_bag1)) elseif i == 'bag2' then sanc_bag2 = j AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w sanc_bag2 set to: @G'..sanc_bag2)) end SaveState() end
function setup_warning(c) if c == 'gt' or c == 'ct' or c == 'repl' or c == 'say' or c == 'spouse' or c == 'local' then warn_chan = c AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w channel set to: @Y'..warn_chan)) else AnsiNote(logoshort..ColoursToANSI('@w accepted arguments are: @Ygt@w, @Yct@w, @Yrepl@w, @Ysay@w, @Yspouse@w, @Ylocal@w.')) end SaveState() end ---------------------- -- Autospellup routine ---------------------- function need_spells(name, line, wc) -- name = splp08 -- line = Your moral standing is no longer cloaked. -- wc = { [0] = "Your moral standing is no longer cloaked." } if not env_gag then writeout(line) end if name == 'gaias_focus' then env_gaias_focus = true return end if name == 'gaias_revenge' then env_gaias_revenge = true end
if not env_spellup then env_spellup = true if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then debugout('Need spells trigger - Out of Combat -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() end end debugout(name:gsub('_',' ')..' @w--> @roff!') end
function queue_spells(name, line, wc) env_spellup = false if not env_gag then writeout(line) end if env_gag then debugout('Gagging line: @w'..line) end end
function failed_spell() if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then env_spellup = true end end
function need_cskill() env_cskill = true if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then debugout('Need cskill trigger - Out of Combat -> give_spellup()') give_spellup() end end
function check_spells_combat() -- If we get "No spells or skills cast." while in combat if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then env_spellup = false else env_spellup = true end end
----------------------- -- Main spellup routine ----------------------- function give_spellup() if not env_active then return end
if not env_init then -- only on first start/reload env_spellup = true env_cskill = true env_init = true if gmcp('char.base.subclass') == 'Shaman' then env_gaias_focus = true env_gaias_revenge = true end if env_active then EnableTriggerGroup('spellup', true) end if env_active2 then EnableTriggerGroup('sanc', true) end if env_active3 then EnableTriggerGroup('warning', true) end end
if env_casting then return end -- don't trigger too often! if env_sanc_queue then env_sanc_queue = false; sanc_lost() end -- we couldn't handle sanc before, try again! if env_sanc_queue2 then env_sanc_queue2 = false; sanc_aura_juggle() end -- we couldn't juggle sanc aura before, try again! check_gaias_focus() -- Shaman specific spell if not env_cskill and not env_spellup then return end -- there's nothing to do, exit
if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then -- fully active and able to receive MUD commands if env_cskill then debugout('--> stupor') SendNoEcho('stupor') end if env_spellup then debugout('--> spellup') SendNoEcho('spellup') end if env_cskill or env_spellup then env_casting = true; DoAfterSpecial(2,"env_casting = false",12) end return end
if zone_is_safe() then local char_state = false if gmcp('char.status.state') == '4' then char_state = 4 end -- AFK if gmcp('char.status.state') == '9' then char_state = 9 end -- sleeping if gmcp('char.status.state') == '11' then char_state = 11 end -- resting or sitting if not char_state then return end -- ignore undefined states
if char_state == 4 then debugout('--> afk') SendNoEcho('afk') end if char_state > 4 then debugout('--> stand') SendNoEcho('stand') end
if env_cskill then debugout('--> stupor') SendNoEcho('stupor') end if env_spellup then debugout('--> spellup') SendNoEcho('spellup') end
if char_state == 4 then debugout('--> afk') SendNoEcho('afk') end if char_state == 9 then debugout('--> sleep') SendNoEcho('sleep') end if char_state == 11 then debugout('--> rest') SendNoEcho('rest') end if env_cskill or env_spellup then env_casting = true; DoAfterSpecial(2,"env_casting = false",12) end end end
function check_gaias_focus() if gmcp('char.base.subclass') ~= 'Shaman' then return end debugout('Checking if I need to cast gaias focus') if env_gaias_focus and env_gaias_revenge then debugout('Trying to cast gaias focus before spellup') SendNoEcho('c 552 '..env_gaias_damtype) end end
function zone_is_safe() debugout('Checking if zone is safe') local zone_list = {'manormount', 'manorwoods', 'manorville', 'manorsea', 'manor1', 'manorisle', 'manor3'} for _, v in ipairs(zone_list) do if v == gmcp('room.info.zone') then debugout(v..' zone detected as safe!'); return true end end return false end
function sanc_lost() if env_sanc_aura then debugout('Sanc is lost - already wearing aura'); return end
env_sanc = true if gmcp('char.status.state') == '8' then debugout('Sanc is lost - In Combat -> sanc_aura_on()') return sanc_aura_on() end
if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' then debugout('Sanc is lost - Out of Combat -> cast sanc') SendNoEcho('c 71') DoAfterSpecial(6,"check_sanc()",12) -- check if we are in sanc after 6 sec else env_spellup = true env_sanc_queue = true end end
function sanc_reset() if env_sanc_aura_lock then return end if env_sanc_aura then debugout('After combat trigger -> sanc_aura_off()'); sanc_aura_off() end end
function sanc_aura_lock() env_sanc_aura_lock = true if not env_sanc_aura then sanc_aura_on() else env_sanc_queue2 = false end SaveState() end
function sanc_aura_unlock() env_sanc_aura_lock = false if env_sanc_aura then sanc_aura_off() else env_sanc_queue2 = false end SaveState() end
function check_sanc() debugout('Checking if sanc landed') if env_sanc and not env_sanc_aura then AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI('@C{-o @Y---------------@C[ ')..logo..ColoursToANSI(' @C]@Y--------------- @Co-}@w')) AnsiNote() AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @CNotice:')) AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @wUnable to cast sanctuary, force wearing sanc aura:')) AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @w - @Yss sanc')) AnsiNote() AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI('@C{-o @Y----------------------------------------------------------------- @Co-}@w')) sanc_aura_lock() end end
function sanc_aura_juggle() if env_sanc_aura then sanc_aura_off() else sanc_aura_on() end end
function sanc_aura_on() if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' or gmcp('char.status.state') == '8' or gmcp('char.status.state') == '11' then if (sanc_bag2 ~= '0') then SendNoEcho('get '..sanc_aura2..' '..sanc_bag2) end -- disable if bag2 == 0 SendNoEcho('wear '..sanc_aura2) if (sanc_bag1 ~= '0') then SendNoEcho('put '..sanc_aura1..' '..sanc_bag1) end -- disable if bag1 == 0 env_sanc_aura = true else env_sanc_queue2 = true end end
function sanc_aura_off() if gmcp('char.status.state') == '3' or gmcp('char.status.state') == '11' then if (sanc_bag1 ~= '0') then SendNoEcho('get '..sanc_aura1..' '..sanc_bag1) end -- disable if bag1 == 0 SendNoEcho('wear '..sanc_aura1) -- switch back the aura SendNoEcho('c 71') -- cast sanctuary if (sanc_bag2 ~= '0') then SendNoEcho('put '..sanc_aura2..' '..sanc_bag2) end -- disable if bag2 == 0 -- env_sanc will be set off with trigger because this may fail if we are stunned! env_sanc_aura = false DoAfterSpecial(6,"check_sanc()",12) -- check if we are in sanc after 6 sec else env_sanc_queue2 = true end end ------------------------------ -- Warnings for pvp and afflix ------------------------------ function issue_warning(what, who) if what == 'web1' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YWEBBED@R<< @C{-o $CI am caught in a web!!' elseif what == 'curse' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YCURSED@R<< @C{-o $CI have been cursed!!' elseif what == 'scry1' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YSCRY@R<< @C{-o $CSomeone is scrying me!!' elseif what == 'web2' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YWEBBED@R<< @C{-o @M'..who..'$C strengthens the web holding me!' elseif what == 'scry2' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YSCRY@R<< @C{-o @M'..who..'$C is scrying me!!' elseif what == 'revenge1' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YREVENGE@R<< @C{-o @M'..who..'$C has revenge on me for @M15 $Cminutes!' elseif what == 'revenge2' then warn_message = '@Co-} @R>>@YREVENGE@R<< @C{-o $CI can now take revenge on @M'..who..'$C for @M15 $Cminutes!' end if warn_chan == 'local' then AnsiNote(logoshort..' '..ColoursToANSI(string.gsub(warn_message,'$C','@W'))) else Send(warn_chan..' '..warn_message) end end
------------------- -- Helpers - output ------------------- function autospellup_help() AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI('@C{-o @Y---------------@C[ ')..logo..ColoursToANSI(' @C]@Y--------------- @Co-}@w')) AnsiNote() AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @CCommands:')) AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss @w- alias for manual spellup')) if env_active then AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss auto @w- toggle auto spellup. Now: [ @GON @w]')) else AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss auto @w- toggle auto spellup. Now: [ @ROFF @w]')) end if env_sanc_aura_lock then AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss sanc @w- replace sanc aura with spell. Now: [ @GON @w]')) else AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss sanc @w- force wearing sanc aura. Now: [ @ROFF @w]')) end if gmcp('char.base.subclass') == 'Shaman' then AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss gaia <dam> @w- change damtype for GaiasFocus. Now: [ @W'..env_gaias_damtype..' @w]')) end if env_active3 then AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss warn @w- toggle auto warnings. (pvp) Now: [ @GON @w]')) else AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss warn @w- toggle auto warnings. (pvp) Now: [ @ROFF @w]')) end if env_debug then AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss debug @w- toggle debug info. Now: [ @GON @w]')) else AnsiNote(ColoursToANSI(' @Yss debug @w- toggle debug info.
